traits.name: Charge
entries: If the oxen moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 ({@damage 2d4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The oxen has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Ram
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage.
